Description.Text:
Property Location
Hotel des Artistes is in the heart of Rome, walking distance from National Central Library of Rome and Umberto I Policlinic of Rome. This romantic hotel is close to Colosseum and Roman Forum.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 48 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with showers feature complimentary toiletries and bidets. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a rooftop terrace and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services. Additional features include babysitting/childcare (surcharge), babysitting/childcare, and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, express check-in, and a 24-hour front desk.


Pets not allowed Check-out time is 10:30 AM
Take advantage of the hotel's room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Hotel des Artistes is in the heart of Rome, walking distance from National Central Library of Rome and Umberto I Policlinic of Rome. This romantic hotel is close to Colosseum and Roman Forum.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

National Central Library of Rome - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Umberto I Policlinic of Rome - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
Diocletian Bath - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Octagonal Hall - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Porta Pia - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Palazzo Massimo alle Terme - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Santa Maria degli Angeli - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Piazza della Repubblica - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
University of Roma-La Sapienza - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Piazza Fiume - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Santa Maria della Vittoria - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Museum of Contemporary Art of Rome - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Teatro dell'Opera di Roma - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Piazza Santa Maria Maggiore - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Teatro Ambra Jovinelli - 1 km / 0.6 mi

The nearest airports are:
Rome (CIA-Ciampino) - 13.7 km / 8.5 mi
Rome (FCO-Fiumicino - Leonardo da Vinci Intl.) - 24.3 km / 15.1 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel des Artistes is Rome (FCO-Fiumicino - Leonardo da Vinci Intl.).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Rome (FCO-Leonardo Da Vinci) - 24.3 km / 15.1 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel des Artistes is Rome (FCO-Leonardo Da Vinci).
